law.catch_line: Within 10 days after the change, each State licensee shall give the State Board written notice of a ...
law.text:
Within 10 days after the change, each State licensee shall give the State Board written notice of a change of:
the name of the State licensee;
the address of:
the State licensee; or
the person to whom the State licensee assigns a local license; or
the employment of the State licensee, including a change in the assignment of a local license.
